microsoft365Deals.name: Enterprise Package
includedServices: Training for an unlimited number of users

erpnextDeals.name: Basic Package
includedServices: Setup and configuration of core modules

addOns.name: Custom Module Development
addOns.description: Development of custom modules tailored to unique business processes or requirements not covered by the standard ERP system functionalities.

addOns.name: Integration Services
addOns.description: Integration of the ERP system with existing business applications (e.g., CRM, eCommerce platforms, external databases) for seamless data flow and operation.
addOns.pricingModel: Basic (up to 3 integrations), Advanced (up to 10 integrations), Custom (10+ integrations).

addOns.name: Advanced Reporting and Analytics
addOns.description: Setup and customization of advanced reporting tools and dashboards to provide deeper insights into business performance metrics and KPIs.

addOns.name: Cloud Hosting and Management
addOns.description: Provision of cloud hosting solutions for the ERP system with ongoing management and maintenance to ensure high availability and security.
addOns.pricingModel: Monthly subscription based on usage and support levels.

addOns.name: Continuous Improvement Package
addOns.description: Ongoing analysis and recommendations for ERP system enhancements, including updates, optimizations, and new features implementation to adapt to changing business needs.

addOns.name: Training Workshops and Webinars
addOns.description: Customized training sessions for different levels of users (end-users, IT staff, managers) to maximize the ERP system's utility and adoption within the organization.
addOns.pricingModel: Per session or bundled package rates.

addOns.name: Emergency Support Services
addOns.description: Priority support services for critical issues, including direct access to senior technical support teams and faster response times.

addOns.name: Compliance and Security Audit
addOns.description: Comprehensive review of the ERP system’s compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations, and implementation of security best practices.

base.name: Entry-Level Package
base.target: Startups and small businesses looking to automate core business functions.
includedServices: Basic ERP system setup with essential modules (e.g., Finance and Sales)
User training for up to 5 users

base.name: Growth Package
base.target: Small businesses ready to expand their ERP functionalities to support growth.
includedServices: Core plus additional modules setup (e.g., Purchasing, Inventory Management)

addOns.name: Cloud Hosting and Management
addOns.description: Leverage cloud services for better scalability and accessibility, offered as a monthly subscription to reduce upfront costs.

addOns.name: Extended Support and Maintenance
addOns.description: Offered as a monthly or annual subscription for ongoing support, updates, and troubleshooting beyond the initial period.

addOns.name: Custom Module Development
addOns.description: Available upon request, with pricing based on the complexity and scope of development.

base.name: Entry-Level POS Package
base.target: Very small businesses, startups, or those new to using POS systems.
includedFeatures: Basic POS software with essential sales processing features

base.name: Standard POS Package
base.target: Growing small businesses needing more functionality and flexibility.
includedFeatures: Advanced POS software with additional features such as customer management

base.name: Complete Business POS Package
base.target: Established small to medium-sized businesses looking for comprehensive POS solutions.
includedFeatures: Full-featured POS software with multi-store support
includedServices: Integration with existing systems (e-commerce, accounting, etc.)

addOns.name: Mobile POS Solutions
addOns.description: For businesses requiring flexibility to make sales anywhere within the location.

addOns.name: Cloud-Based Data Management
addOns.description: For easy access to sales data and analytics from anywhere, ensuring business continuity.

addOns.name: Extended Support and Maintenance
addOns.description: Beyond the initial support period for software updates, troubleshooting, and hardware maintenance.

addOns.name: Additional Hardware
addOns.description: Additional terminals, mobile scanners, and printers as the business grows.

base.name: Basic CRM Package
base.target: Very small businesses or startups taking their first step into formal customer relationship management.
includedServices: Basic customization to align with local business practices
Initial user training for up to 5 users

base.name: Professional CRM Package
base.target: Small businesses looking to deepen customer engagement and streamline sales processes.

base.name: Enterprise CRM Package
base.target: Medium-sized businesses seeking a comprehensive CRM solution to support complex sales cycles and marketing strategies.
includedFeatures: Complete CRM functionalities including marketing automation
Integration capabilities with other business systems (ERP, POS, etc.)

addOns.name: Marketing Automation Module
addOns.description: For businesses looking to automate and optimize their marketing efforts.

addOns.name: Customer Service & Support Module
addOns.description: Adds capabilities for ticketing, service workflows, and customer feedback management.

addOns.name: Advanced Analytics & Business Intelligence
addOns.description: For deeper insights into customer behavior, sales performance, and business forecasting.

addOns.name: Additional Training and Support
addOns.description: Tailored training sessions for new features or additional staff, and extended support contracts.

base.name: ERP System Management Package
base.description: For Businesses seeking to outsource the management of their ERP system to ensure efficiency, reliability, and optimization.
includedServices: Complete ERP system administration and maintenance.
User access management and security monitoring.
First-level support for all ERP-related queries and issues.

base.name: Financial Processes Outsourcing Package
base.description: For Companies looking to outsource their financial operations managed within their ERP system, such as accounts payable/receivable, general ledger management, and financial reporting.
base.priceRange: ₱100,000 - ₱200,000 per month, depending on transaction volume and complexity.

base.name: HR and Payroll Outsourcing Package
base.description: For Organizations aiming to outsource their HR and payroll functions to streamline operations and ensure compliance with local regulations.
includedServices: Payroll processing, including taxes, benefits, and deductions.
Employee data management within the ERP.
base.priceRange: ₱90,000 - ₱180,000 per month, based on the number of employees and service scope.

base.name: Supply Chain Management Outsourcing Package
base.description: For Businesses seeking expertise in managing their supply chain operations through ERP systems to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
base.priceRange: ₱120,000 - ₱250,000 per month, depending on the complexity of the supply chain.

addOns.name: Custom ERP Development and Integration
addOns.description: For clients needing customization of their existing ERP system or integration with other software solutions.

addOns.name: Advanced Analytics and BI Services
addOns.description: Offering deep insights into business operations through advanced analytics, reporting, and business intelligence services.

addOns.name: Strategic ERP Consulting
addOns.description: High-level strategic consulting services to optimize ERP deployment and utilization for business growth and transformation.
